original_text: Take the sum of the prey that was taken, both of man and of beast, thou, and Eleazar the priest, and the chief fathers of the congregation:
korean_text: 너는 제사장 엘르아살과 회중의 수령들과 더불어 이 사로잡은 사람들과 짐승들을 계수하고

sentences.original_text: Take the sum of the prey that was taken
both of man and of beast
and the chief fathers of the congregation:
